title: Ticket #1984: add support for SGE grid type
description: Derek Weitzel points out that the blahp has support for SGE, but Condor does not make use of it. He requests that Condor enable SGE support. This would be useful for his campus factory, which submits glideins to local batch systems.
attachments:
• 0001-Initial-attempt-at-adding-SGE-support.patch 2005 bytes added by danb on 2011-Mar-21 15:07:38 UTC.
    A patch from Derek. He says the blahp configuration needs to be modified in addition to this patch.
  • 0001-Initial-attempt-at-adding-SGE-support.patch 1958 bytes added by dweitzel on 2011-Nov-22 05:58:57 UTC.
    New sge patch rebased upon branch V7_7-bosco-publicbranch.
check_ins:
2012-Feb-01 15:30   Check-in [30085]: Thought of one more place that new sge grid type needed to be documented: as a value for the submit command grid_resource. ===GT=== #1984 (By Karen Miller )
2012-Feb-01 15:09   Check-in [30081]: editing corrections and addition of defn of config knob SGE_GAHP. ===GT=== #1984 (By Karen Miller )
2011-Nov-23 11:00   Check-in [28415]: Add SGE parameters to blahp config file. #1984 Committer: Jaime Frey (By =Derek Weitzel )
2011-Nov-22 15:00   Check-in [28405]: Document new sge grid universe type. #1984 ===VersionHistory:Complete=== (By Jaime Frey )
2011-Nov-22 14:59   Check-in [28404]: Support submission to Sun Grid Engine vi blahp. #1984 The blahp we distribute already supports SGE. Now, condor_submit and condor_gridmanager recognize it. Committer: Jaime Frey (By Derek Weitzel )
creator: danb
